decls.name: IGFD_FileStyleByExtention
decls.docComment: define style by extention, for files or links

decls.name: IGFD_FileStyleByFullName
decls.docComment: define style for particular file/dir/link full name (filename + extention)

decls.name: IGFD_FileStyleByContainedInFullName
decls.docComment: define style for file/dir/link when criteria is contained in full name

decls.name: ImGuiFileDialogFlags_DontShowHiddenFiles
decls.docComment: dont show hidden file (file starting with a .)

decls.name: ImGuiFileDialogFlags_NoDialog
decls.docComment: let the dialog embedded in your own imgui begin / end scope

decls.name: ImGuiFileDialogFlags_ReadOnlyFileNameField
decls.docComment: don't let user type in filename field for file open style dialogs

decls.name: ImGuiFileDialogFlags_CaseInsensitiveExtentionFiltering
decls.docComment: the file extentions filtering will not take into account the case

decls.name: ImGuiFileDialogFlags_NaturalSorting
decls.docComment: enable the antural sorting for filenames and extentions, slower than standard sorting

decls.name: IGFD_ResultMode_KeepInputFile
decls.docComment: IGFD_ResultMode_KeepInputFile keep the input file => no modification : filter {.cpp,.h} with file : toto.h => toto.h toto. => toto. toto => toto filter {.z,.a.b} with file : toto.a.h => toto.a.h toto. => toto. toto => toto filter {.g.z,.a} with file : toto.a.h => toto.a.h toto. => toto. toto => toto

decls.docComment: The ordering will be used during sort.

decls.docComment: The ordering will be used during sort.

decls.name: File
decls.docComment: The ordering will be used during sort.

decls.name: LinkToUnknown
decls.docComment: link to something that is not a regular file or directory.
